programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep7
programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero but being brave quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep17
programme.desc: Rupert and the Giant Sunflower - Rupert is very excited. Mother Nature has given him a special elixir to help his sunflower seeds grow but there's a big surprise to come.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep18
programme.desc: Rupert and the Cuckoo Clock - When Mum's cuckoo clock breaks time stops and Ping Pong, Ming, Edward and Bill freeze in time. Rupert and the Fox Twins have to find a way to get time ticking again

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep43
programme.desc: What's The Funny Little Creature In The Pond? - Jess is looking after Horace's underwater friends in the pond whilst Horace is away. He sees a funny creature with a round head, a long tail and a little mark on his nose. What's the funny little creature in the pond? Hey! That's the Big Question! The creature has vanished so Jess describes it to Mimi who draws a picture of it. Mimi, Joey and Jinx think it must be a fish and name him Freddie, but Jess is not so sure. Time passes and Jess doesn't see Freddie again for ages. When he does spot him he's grown two back legs! Jess decides he needs a closer look using Billie's magnifying glass. They search for Freddie all round the pond. Baa thinks he's found him, but it turns out to be a newt, with four legs and spots on its back. At that moment a small frog jumps out onto a lily pad. It has the white mark on its nose just like Freddie but this is a frog! What's happened wonders Jess. Horace comes back and explains that frogs start out as tadpoles and gradually change, growing legs and losing their tail.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep44
programme.desc: How Can We Keep Dry For Horace's Concert? - Horace has planned a big musical show but before it can start it begins raining and everyone runs for shelter. How can we keep dry? Asks JESS - that's the Big Question. Jess, Baa and Billie find shelter under some vine leaves. They're keeping dry but they're too far away from the pond to watch the show. Jess thinks that maybe they could wear a hat to keep dry Baa's hat is soft and lets the water in though so that's no good but it gives Jess another idea. They can use the big basket in his barn as a giant hat to keep them all dry. It's made of wood and is hard. It's bound to keep them dry. But the woven basket lets the water in too. What are they going to do? Mimi walks by with her umbrella. She's lovely and dry. They all try to crowd under it but it's not big enough. We need to build a BIG umbrella says Jess. And they can use the vine leaves that kept them dry earlier. Perfect. The friends all build a huge umbrella that they can shelter under as they listen to Horace's fantastic music show. They've

programme.title: Olivia Ep17
programme.desc: Olivia's Fashion Show - After attending a disappointing fashion show with Grandma, Olivia designs some fabulous clothes and is determined to put on her own show. Unfortunately, her models (Ian, Francine and Julian) prove to be more difficult to work with than she'd anticipated. It's up to Olivia to think fast and make the fashion show work!

programme.title: Olivia Ep18
programme.desc: Olivia Makes A Video - When Father takes an out-of-town business trip, Olivia doesn't want him to miss a thing. She decides to create a video diary, filming her family and classmates' everyday life, which isn't quite as exciting as she'd hoped. So Olivia adds her own touch to the final presentation: a big song and dance finish. Dad is thrilled.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep802
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sweet Mayor - Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep509
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Game - Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Detectives - Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super Christopher - Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep411
programme.desc: The Case of the Missing Thinking Chair - The Thinking Chair is MISSING! This is a mystery so huge that Josh and Blue need to call in the Blueprints Detective Agency for Steve's help. Working together, will they be able to figure out this big mystery?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Rocky Saves Himself / Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat - Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger. // Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep924
programme.desc: Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire - A hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go awry sending her careening down Jake's Mountain.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Baby Steel / Joke's On You - When Steel accidentally turns himself into a baby, he wreaks havoc on Platinum City. // It's the annual "Day of Fun"! However when Ricardo and Trickalien play the ultimate prank on the Deer Squad, the day of fun soon turns into a day of chaos!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper - Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share? // Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition and enjoy a special icecream prize, but teamwork is key!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Guacamole - Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Pups Make a Splash / Pups Fall Festival - When Capn Turbots boat runs aground, Ryder, Zuma, Skye, and Rocky must team up to save it before it sinks! // The PAW Patrol must pick all Farmer Yumis fruit before an early snowstorm comes! But how can Chase help?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Pups Save the Sea Turtles / Pups and the Very Big Baby - Ryder, Chase, and Rubble hatch a plan to help sea turtle hatchlings safely cross the road to get to the beach! // Theres a beached baby whale in Adventure Bay! Can the Paw Patrol work together to reunite it with its mother?

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ultra Shell and Wonder Bear / You Ain't Seen Nothing Yeti / Powerless - Bossy helps Turtle's Biggest Dream Come True: being a superhero! // Bossy and Turtle go camping and learn the story of the magical Yeti. // With the power out, Bossy's family must find a way to keep themselves entertained.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Sherman in the Middle / Smoothie Day - Hank becomes frustrated when he has to share his father's time with his new stepsisters. // As the squiddos prepare for Smoothie Day, William makes a new friend whose jokes are more hurtful than funny.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Doctor Drama / The White Whale - After injuring his fin, Hank is afraid to go to the doctor. // Baby and William search high and low for the most delicious flownuts in the ocean.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: To The Lighthouse / The Golden Giant - When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. // When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - When Bonnie Bones steals Enrique's ship, he begrudgingly works with the Pirate Protectors to get it back.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Dog - Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Recycling Power! - When Axle City is visited by a littering raccoon, it's up to Blaze to save the day as a Super Recycling Truck! He cleans up the town and rescues his friends - just in time for a final showdown with the Litter Critter!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep512
programme.desc: The Mechanic Team! - Blaze stops into Gabby's Garage for a quick repair - just as she gets an alert! Three far-flung trucks need her mechanical know-how! So, Blaze and AJ volunteer to help her take her garage on the go!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep508
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger - When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Pups Save the PawPaws / Pups Save a Popped Top - Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble. // The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off and he needs help saving his corn crop.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Sherman in the Middle / Smoothie Day - Hank becomes frustrated when he has to share his father's time with his new stepsisters. // As the squiddos prepare for Smoothie Day, William makes a new friend whose jokes are more hurtful than funny.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band.

programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Paddington Vs The Seagulls / Paddington And The Lighthouse - Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them, but can he deliver lunch while it is still hot? // The lighthouse light is broken, and on a foggy night too, can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep411

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep412
programme.desc: The Big Blue Derby - Start your engines, because the Big Blue Derby is about to begin! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can make Slippery's racecar go super-fast in the race as he goes head-to-head with Blue, Rainbow Puppy and his cousin Slick!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save the Jungle Penguins / Pups Save a Freighter - An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Deep Dive / Firefruit Surprise - When Lola and Jade think they see mermaids in Sparkle Sea, Jade uses a Glow Crystal trying find them and disturbs the deep-sea fishes below. // Steel convinces Bobbi to harvest a fire-fruit on Sparkle Island but they set off a volcano unexpectedly!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Paddington's Beach Clean-Up / Paddington's Holiday Farewell - The beach is a mess, but will all the litter be cleared in time for the beach party that everyone has been looking forward to? // The summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Pups and the Kitty-tastrophe / Pups Save a Train - Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a lost kitty from the bay, but who will save them from all the mayhem she causes? // Ryder, Rubble, and Rocky call in Chase to help them free Katie and Calis train from a rockslide!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Pup Pup Boogie / Pups in a Fog - The PAW Patrol must work quickly to fix the tracks and remove a train car at the Adventure Bay Train Station, before the next train comes. // Ryder and the PAW Patrol battle the clock to fix the lighthouse.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep110
programme.desc: New Squid on the Block / Boss Bissy / To BFF or Not to BFF - When a new kid starts at school, Bossy does everything to make sure they have a good time. // Bossy wishes he was older like his big sister. // Bossy and Turtle fail to get a perfect score on a bestie quiz.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Finterstellar / Goldie's Greatest Role - Baby and Grandpa team up to win a bubble rocket competition. // Goldie puts on a play about a skatefish boarding legend and casts herself in the lead, instead of giving Vola a chance to shine.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Sherman in the Middle / Smoothie Day - Hank becomes frustrated when he has to share his father's time with his new stepsisters. // As the squiddos prepare for Smoothie Day, William makes a new friend whose jokes are more hurtful than funny.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Princess and the Pirate Puppy / Caracol Cove - Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend. // Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Garden Academy S02 Ep215
programme.desc: How do Instruments Sound? - Monti learns what strings, wind, keys, and percussion instruments sound like.

programme.title: Garden Academy S02 Ep216
programme.desc: How to Make Colorful Jelly - Col and Margarita play restaurant. They learn to prepare colorful jelly and include it as a dessert on the menu.

programme.title: Garden Academy S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Time to Go to the Bathroom - Monti and Rose teach us the importance of listening to our bodies. Monti learns to stop playing to go to the bathroom.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Computer - Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Big Balloon Rescue - All of Axle City is enjoying the Balloon Fair - until Crusher and Pickle get stuck on a runaway hot-air balloon! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to rescue their high-flying friends... before they crash into the Slime Volcano!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep509
programme.desc: The Great Space Race - Blaze and AJ take off into space for a race that's out of this world! Along the way to Planet Victory, they meet friendly aliens, dodge asteroids, and face off against Crusher's space ship!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep521
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock / Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House - Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pluck-O-Matic / Pups Save a Mascot - Yumi's new Robo- Corn Plucker goes haywire, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol must get it under control. // Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot for the Adventure Bay, gets carried away by a couple of eagles who mistake him for one of their own!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Finterstellar / Goldie's Greatest Role - Baby and Grandpa team up to win a bubble rocket competition. // Goldie puts on a play about a skatefish boarding legend and casts herself in the lead, instead of giving Vola a chance to shine.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Fish Friends Forever - When Baby Shark and friends enter a battle of the bands, Baby's rivalry with Shadow gets heated.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Paddington's Puffling Rescue / Paddington Goes Under The Sea - Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite // Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonatahn and Judy - but where is Judy's necklace?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep412
programme.desc: The Big Blue Derby - Start your engines, because the Big Blue Derby is about to begin! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can make Slippery's racecar go super-fast in the race as he goes head-to-head with Blue, Rainbow Puppy and his cousin Slick!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Deep Dive / Firefruit Surprise - When Lola and Jade think they see mermaids in Sparkle Sea, Jade uses a Glow Crystal trying find them and disturbs the deep-sea fishes below. // Steel convinces Bobbi to harvest a fire-fruit on Sparkle Island but they set off a volcano unexpectedly!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Magic Spyglass / The Stone of Life - Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase. / Santi and crew follow a map to a special treasure, but Bonnie and Sir Butterscotch are hot on their trail.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Finterstellar / Goldie's Greatest Role - Baby and Grandpa team up to win a bubble rocket competition. // Goldie puts on a play about a skatefish boarding legend and casts herself in the lead, instead of giving Vola a chance to shine.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep111
programme.desc: New New Year / Finders Keepers / Busy Buddies - Bossy is worried his family does not celebrate the Korean New Year "the right way. // Bossy finds a cool toy but doesn't want to give it up. // Bossy and Turtle overtask themselves when they take on all class jobs at once.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Pups Save Ace's Birthday Surprise / Pups Save a Tower of Pizza - Adventure Bay is working hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas! // Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep802
programme.desc: Pups Save a Magic Trick - When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Crew Does A Home Renovation / The Crew Builds A Lighthouse - The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. // Cap'n Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Photo - Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep106
programme.desc: We Love Nature - Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! A thunder makes things worse. Luckily, Anna's living room makes a great camp site!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep412
programme.desc: The Big Blue Derby - Start your engines, because the Big Blue Derby is about to begin! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can make Slippery's racecar go super-fast in the race as he goes head-to-head with Blue, Rainbow Puppy and his cousin Slick!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save the Jungle Penguins / Pups Save a Freighter - An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep71
programme.desc: Didgeridoo - Tinky Winky learns to play the didgeridoo. The Teletubbies do a special didgeridoo Tubby Phone Dance. Tiddlytubby Ping loves the didgeridoo too!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Feet - Dee encourages a friend to say 'feet' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! There are little feet, jumping feet and there's even a little duckling with some webbed feet.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep25
programme.desc: The First Big Camping Adventure - The friends are excited to go on a camping trip, but Zip is nervous about being in a dark place away from home. He must try to overcome his fears.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tastebuddies - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Someone pass Messy the tissues! He discovers that things just don't taste the same when he has a cold, especially his favourite chewy green socks - let's find out why.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep59
programme.desc: Camping - Monty tries to pack too many items for a camping trip, but he learns that sometimes less is more after he and Jimmy Jones work together.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Claw - When Bluey and Bingo are unable to grab a prize on a Magic Claw machine, Mum and Dad create their own version at home. But Dad isn't about to make winning easy.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Making Music Badge - When the squirrels find Duggee playing saxophone, they want to have a go too. Several pots, balloons, tins, water and tubes later and the squirrels are making music. And boy, are they loud!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep30
programme.desc: The Cinema Badge - Before the Squirrels attend the cinema for the first time, Duggee teaches them that there are rules they need to follow.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep29
programme.desc: The Difficult Badge - As the Squirrels appreciate Norrie's new bike, they discover that she doesn't know how to ride it, she finds it too difficult.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Gua Rusa, Borneo - When Grandmaster Glitch discovers his Halloween pumpkin isn't as big as the Grimbots' one, he goes in search of some fertilizer to help it grow.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Wind Power - The Go Jetters race to save Glitch when his kite flies too close to the Academy wind farm.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Doctor - Honey is stuck waiting for Dr Bingo's as the other injuries get seen before her. Receptionist Bluey tells her to be patient, some of these cases are a real pickle!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Calypso - At school, Bluey and her friends enjoy various games. Teacher Calypso keeps her charges on track with a wise word and a song... all except the mysterious Pretzel.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures S1 Ep40
programme.desc: Andy and the Asian Elephants - When Jen notices a herd of Asian elephants are caught in a flood in Bangladesh, it's up to Andy to help them.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Animal Machines - Grace looks at machines that all look like animals! She rides a Seabreacher and a robot hexapod, and the archive feature is an Ornithopter.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep23
programme.desc: Head Scarf Calamity - Captain Captain decides to check that Sandy and Seaweed's pirate uniforms are clean, tidy and in perfect order. She is disappointed to discover that Seaweed's headscarf isn't up to scratch.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep28
programme.desc: The News Badge - After learning that Duggee is making his yearly batch of blueberry jam, a tradition passed on from his great-aunt, the Squirrels decide to spread the news.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep27
programme.desc: The Ball Badge - The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they all have their own favourite way of using it, whether it be kicking, throwing or catching.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep26
programme.desc: The Commuting Badge - Norrie is running late to Squirrel Club, so Duggee teaches the squirrels what a commute is - a journey that can take you from home to learn, work or play.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Bullet Train, Japan - All aboard for a high-speed adventure, as the Go Jetters visit Japan's Bullet Train.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Central Park, New York - Glitch visits Broadway, while the Go Jetters tackle a huge cloud of smog in Central Park.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep8
programme.desc: Diesel's Special Delivery - Diesel swaps his dull load of slate for a haul of shiny red apples in order to please Sodor's school children.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Magic Panic - Umbrella needs Sarah and Duck's help after he promises to put on a magic show.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Train Fudge - Sarah and Duck take an unexpected train trip whilst on their quest to buy some fudge.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Sand Monsters - Sand Monster Nelly and Sand Monster Nora love to knock down sand castles!

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Dog Loves Don Quixote - Pug needs a story about how to be brave. Dog and Pug meet the great Spanish knight Don Quixote and his partner Sancho Panza. Pug needs saving and Don Quixote defeats the giant windmills.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep57
programme.desc: Seabed Sleepover - Monty has reservations about attending a sleepover when he realises he will be away from Jimmy Jones. He soon decides it could be good for him and Jimmy to be apart for a while.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep31
programme.desc: It's time for a birthday party - When JoJo learns that Jared was too busy to have a birthday party, Gran Gran has a Gran Gran Plan to throw Jared a surprise belated birthday party!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep18
programme.desc: What Goes Up - When Mo's kite gets stuck up on an office roof, the team rescue it in a down-to-earth way.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Apple Grapple - After a shaky start, the team discovers an easy way to pick apples.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Tickle Crabs - When Dad brings a pair of tenacious tickle crabs home from the beach, nowhere in the house is safe! His only hope of escaping their tickles is with help from his true love.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep25
programme.desc: The Wisdom Badge - The Squirrels see Duggee reading about wise animals and wish to learn more about what it means to be wise.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep24
programme.desc: The Listening Badge - The Squirrels hear a strange sound that they've not heard before, so they ask Duggee to help identify it.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep23
programme.desc: The Choir Badge - The Squirrels become enchanted when they hear a piece of music from Duggee's choir. They quickly learn what makes a choir.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep12
programme.desc: White Cliffs of Dover, England - The Go Jetters race to save the White Cliffs of Dover when Glitch digs for classroom chalk.

programme.desc: Harbin Ice City, China - GrimHQ overheats so lands in Harbin Ice City, melting the amazing ice sculptures.

programme.desc: Running Like Clockwork - When the Numpups mix up the numbers on the kitchen clock, it's hard to run the Tasty Termite like clockwork.

programme.title: Dokumentari: Semua Tentang Kita Khas 5/12 (Rpt)
programme.desc: Warga Malaysia yang perihatin terhadap keperluan orang lain selain menyedari betapa mereka ini memerlukan bantuan, terutamanya pesakit kanser di Institut Kanser Negara (IKN), meluangkan masa untuk membantu mereka ketika mendapatkan rawatan di IKN. Merekalah sukarelawan yang sanggup mendaftarkan diri dengan NGO-NGO yang pelbagai untuk kerja-kerja ehsan secara rela hati; tanpa bayaranl. Ikuti kisah mereka, dalam suka dan dukamereka terus membantu tanpa rasa jerih dan letih, untuk meringankan beban yang hanya mereka tahu betapa beratnya ia

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Cleaning: A Ritual For The Soul
programme.desc: Our explorer takes a dive into Japan's culture of cleaning schools, shrines, and temples, and how it influences local mindsets and values.

programme.title: Framing Everyday Moments
programme.desc: A unique time-lapse photography project. Shot by pros and non-pros from around the world, on the transience of nature, celestial phenomena, cityscapes and each single moment of everyday life.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Chef Sasaki Yotaro is known for his unique fermented dishes and doburoku, an unfiltered sake he brews from rice he grows himself. He talks about the craft that goes into creating world-class cuisine.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Istvan Lorincz, a Romanian of Hungarian origin who's a pastor and expert herbalist in Sapporo, Hokkaido, as well as Vietnamese Hoai Thuong who works at a hot spring inn in Shimane.

programme.title: Empowering Kids Through Song
programme.desc: A Brazilian woman living in Japan is trying to promote a music video she made for kids about sexual abuse while navigating the differences between the two cultures.

programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.desc: Two titles were on the line at UFC 274 as Charles Oliveira faced off against Justin Gaethje and Rose Namajunas took on Carla Esparza in a rematch of their Ultimate Fighter Finale bout. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep902BlachowiczvsAdesanya

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC275TeixeiravsProchazka

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep5

Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Almeida vs. Lewis EpPrelims
programme.desc: On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

In the explosive UFC 295 main event, Jiri Prochazka attempts to regain his 205-pound crown against former middleweight king Alex Pereira in a bout fans have been waiting for. Plus, its another Fight of the Year candidate in the co-main event when Russian powerhouse Sergei Pavlovich takes on British banger Tom Aspinall for the interim UFC heavyweight title.
